name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】Super Special Party Time! ３Dお披露目！#Kiara3DParty [q3Z9dPHKS3Q]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening animation for Takanashi Kiara's 3D Showcase debut, featuring logo graphics and music.
A 3D animated sequence where Takanashi Kiara walks on stage, sits on a giant egg that hatches into a small chick character, and they pose together.
Takanashi Kiara performs her song 'SPARKS' on a virtual neon city stage.
